summary: Internal FBI email chain from July 2020 requesting assistance for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation from Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) in the New York Field Office. The emails discuss coordinating help for discovery preparation with a deadline by the end of August.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking squad, requesting assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation and coordinating help for discovery preparation.

connections.description: Both are FBI Special Agents involved in coordinating assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation, with SA being the point of contact for Squad C-20.

events.title: FBI Assistance Request for Epstein/Maxwell Investigation
events.description: Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) in the FBI New York Field Office sends out a request for assistance related to the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, describing it as a unique opportunity to assist with a high profile case.

events.title: Discovery Preparation Deadline
events.description: The FBI team has a turnaround time of end of August for preparing items for discovery in the Epstein/Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) was actively seeking assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation as of July 2020.
The investigation involved preparation of discovery materials with a deadline by the end of August 2020.
The case was described internally as a 'high profile case' and a 'unique opportunity' for FBI agents.
The correspondence shows ongoing investigative activity related to Epstein/Maxwell well after Epstein's death in 2019.
